pddl4j.exp.term
Interface Term

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Exp, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTerm, BinaryAdd, BinaryDivide, BinaryMultiply, BinaryOp, BinarySubstract, Constant, FExp, FHead, NArityAdd, NArityMultiply, NArityOp, Number, OpExp, Variable
public interface Term
extends Exp, java.lang.Cloneable

This interface define all the method applicable to a PDDL term.

Method Summary

          Substitutes all occurrences of the variables that occur in this term and that are bound in the substitution by its binding term.

unify

Substitution unify(Term term)
Unify this term with an other specified term. Note, call unify does not modify the parameters of this method.

Parameters:
term - the term to unify with.
Returns:
The substitution that defines the binding constraints needed to unify this term with the other term or null if no binding constraints allows to unify the two terms.

unify

Substitution unify(Term term,
                   Substitution sigma)
Unify this term with an other specified term by taking into account a specified set of binding constraints. Note, call unify does not modify the parameters of this method.

Parameters:
term - the term to unify with.
sigma - the substitution containing the binding constraints.
Returns:
The substitution that defines the binding constraints needed to unify this term with the other term or null if no binding constraints allows to unify the two terms.

apply

Term apply(Substitution sigma)
Substitutes all occurrences of the variables that occur in this term and that are bound in the substitution by its binding term. This method modify the content of the term on which it is applied.

Specified by:
apply in interface Exp
Parameters:
sigma - the substitution.
Returns:
the substituted term.

Returns true if a term occurs in this term.

Specified by:
occurs in interface Exp
Parameters:
term - the term to be tested.
Returns:
true if a term occurs in this expression; false otherwise.

Term standardize()
Standardizes all occurrences of the variables that occur in this term.

Specified by:
standardize in interface Exp
Returns:

standardize

Term standardize(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> images)
Standardizes all occurrences of the variables that occur in this term. The map argument is used to store the variable already standardized. The bound argument is used to store the bound variables. a standardized copy of this expression. Remember that free variables are existentially quantified.

Specified by:
standardize in interface Exp
Parameters:
images - the object that maps old variable images to the standardize image.
Returns:
a standardized copy of this term.
